note.p: Career: Entered the service of the HEIC (1790) and went to India; Ensign (1793); Lieutenant (1794); studied oriental languages; Professor of Arabic and Persian, College of Fort William; served in the Mahratta war as Captain and political agent; retired and returned to England (1817); Director, HEIC (1823)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1832-1833 No 14 p 229
